title: Criminals

description.plain:
Criminals (a.k.a Call Us Criminals) was an outtake from the 2018 version of “Treat Myself”, it was supposed to be the 6th track according to a post on ATRL and the Original Tracklist of Scrapped 2018 Release. The song was reworked and released on the deluxe edition of Timeless, marking over 6 years since it was first mentioned by Meghan on Twitter. The original demo from 2018 leaked shortly after the Official Release.

In 2024, Criminals was used as the opening theme of the series “The Perfect Couple)”, starring Eve Hewson and Nicole Kidman.

embed_content: Read “Criminals” by Meghan Trainor on Genius

body.plain:
Criminals (a.k.a Call Us Criminals) was an outtake from the 2018 version of “Treat Myself”, it was supposed to be the 6th track according to a post on ATRL and the Original Tracklist of Scrapped 2018 Release. The song was reworked and released on the deluxe edition of Timeless, marking over 6 years since it was first mentioned by Meghan on Twitter. The original demo from 2018 leaked shortly after the Official Release.

In 2024, Criminals was used as the opening theme of the series “The Perfect Couple)”, starring Eve Hewson and Nicole Kidman.
